alert.note: Alert for Laurel; McCreary; Pulaski; Rockcastle; Wayne; Whitley (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Frost Advisory issued April 19 at 3:51AM EDT until April 20 at 9:00AM EDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...FROST ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM EDT THIS MORNING... ...FROST ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO 9 AM EDT WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...For the first Frost Advisory, temperatures as low as 31 will result in frost formation. For the second Frost Advisory, temperatures as low as 31 will result in frost formation. A few of the typically coldest valleys could briefly drop to 29. * WHERE...Rockcastle, Pulaski, Laurel, Wayne, McCreary and Whitley Counties. * WHEN...For the first Frost Advisory, until 9 AM EDT this morning. For the second Frost Advisory, from midnight tonight to 9 AM EDT Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Frost could kill sensitive outdoor vegetation if left uncovered. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The coldest temperatures and most extensive frost is expected in valleys. Ridgetop locations will see temperatures generally remaining above freezing, limiting frost formation.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold.

area.areaDesc: Laurel; McCreary; Pulaski; Rockcastle; Wayne; Whitley
